title:
A note on the unknotting number and the region unknotting number of
  weaving knots
authors: Ayaka Shimizu, Amrendra Gill and Sahil Joshi
abstract:
A weaving knot is an alternating knot whose minimal diagram is a closed braid
of a lattice-like pattern. In this paper, upper bounds of the unknotting number
and the region unknotting number for some families of weaving knots are given
by diagrammatical and combinatorial examination of the warping degree of
weaving knot diagrams.
